RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE APRIL 27, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 27 Allowe d 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUDGE HEAD matched for the lead along the rail into the stretch, responded readily when set down, gained a clear lead late and finished full of run to win going away. HANSENATION set a pressured pace two wide into the far turn then was no match for winner but held on for second while drifting out. BLACKTIEANDTUX close up four wide, dropped back on the far turn, swung wide then came on again five wide. OFTEN ENOUGH never far back, finished with good courage two wide. DEER CREEK ROAD stalked the pace three then four wide and was outfinished. STONE COLD CAT unhurried early, finished determinedly along the rail. NAMBITI unhurried early, improved position along the rail on the far turn then failed to sustain that bid. SAMMY DA BULL failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy Da Bull
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Often Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Judge Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: matched strides rail, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Hansenation
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, 2 wide, no match for winner, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Blacktieandtux
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, dropped back 2nd turn, swung wide, came again,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 45. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 27 Allowed 4 lbs. ClaimingPrice $7 ,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PENNIESANDDIMES pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, drifted to the five path, was put to a right handed whip, made the lead before the furlong marker and proved best by a narrow margin while fully extended. PATTI LOU trailed early three wide, altered course to the eight path entering the stretch, rallied determinedly and just missed. MISS ELLIE made the lead shortly after the start, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. BUSYBEING FABULOUS stalked the pace three wide, drifted to the seven path entering the stretch then lacked the needed response. SHANGHAI ROYALTY turned in an even effort. BONNIE'S BEST had brief speed inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Patti Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, altered course 8path top lane, closed willingly, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Penniesanddimes
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted 5path top lane, long drive, all out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Peter Sheppell, John Royer & Super Saver Syndicate

ENTRY.NAME: Busybeing Fabulous
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, drifted, 7path top lane, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 47. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOMELY INSPIRED prompted the pace three then two wide into the stretch, dug in under left handed urging and proved best under strong handling. PLAYING FOR KEEPS matched strides for the early lead along the rail, dropped back on the turn, swung out to the six path entering the stretch then came on again to finish clear for second while gaining on the winner. FLAG RAISER away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide then along the inside into the stretch and was outfinished. PRIMITIVO had a mild rally late two wide. PLAYING BALL allowed to settle, finished with good courage along the rail. CONTROLLER was no threat. MARCH MAGIC was outrun. HAPPY TAKEOVER was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Playing for Keeps
ENTRY.COMMENT: matched strides rail, dropped back turn, came again 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Primitivo
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William

ENTRY.NAME: Controller
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Playing Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, finished well rail

ENTRY.NAME: Awesomely Inspired
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, perfect trip, driving, left handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Race s For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SENORA PANQUEQUES never far back, closed willingly four wide through deep stretch under right handed urging and was along in time. GOODNESS SAKES well back early, closed with a burst of speed three wide through the stretch and got up for second. DIAMONDS N DEW pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead before the furlong marker then was outfinished in a game effort. RUNLIKEJACKIEO found her best stride late in the five path. SORORITY SISTER failed to menace. EMERSON JONES with the second flight inside, failed to respond. SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS broke in front, set a pressured pace until mid stretch then weakened. HOSANNA pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and gave way late. LUCKY PENNY ROSE was outrun. HITCH CITY was through after a half. CAN I GO TOO appeared to clip heels at the start and was never close.

ENTRY.NAME: Emerson Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Shakeurskinnylegs
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace mid stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Runlikejackieo
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Senora Panqueques
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 4 wide, right urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Can I Go Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: appeared to clip heels start, never close

ENTRY.NAME: Goodness Sakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early, closed fast 3wide, between horses, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Hosanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Diamonds N Dew
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, led late, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WINE ME UP BABY broke in full stride to set all the pace unchallenged while getting fast fractions and maintained her advantage while drifting out under a strong hand ride. PASSIONFORTREASURE unhurried early, rallied determinedly along the rail through the stretch and finished clear for second. PULPIT'S PURRFECT chased the pace from the inside for a half, drifted to the six path entering the stretch then faded. KINGSTON TIME failed to menace. PURITY chased the winner two wide and was through after a half. GIRLINTHEFIREPLACE was no factor. SHE'S PURE SILVER away alertly, inched closer three wide on the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Passionfortreasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied inside, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Wine Me Up Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set fast pace, drifted out late, hand ride

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In W eight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STORMIN'UNCLEJACK was bumped at the start, prompted the pace three then two wide into the stretch, made the lead and drew off under left handed urging. R CARDINAL PRINCE bore out at the start bumping a rival, settled with the second flight along the inside. shifted out to the six path nearing the top of the stretch, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack and got up for second. AGNELLO'S DREAM bore out at the start bumping rivals, prompted the early pace two wide, set the tempo through the turn then was outfinished. ONEMORANDTHECHECK broke in front, set the early pace along the inside then was overpowered. CENTSOFWANDER failed to menace. GOLD HERITAGE was bumped at the start, moved up two wide through the turn, dropped to the rail then leveled off. BAD LITTLE BEAST was no factor. ON HIS TOES was bumped at the start then no threat. GRAND DEAL had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, rallied for second mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Heritage
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle move inside, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, pressed 2 wide, led, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Stormin'unclejack
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed 3 wide, responded left urging, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Dr. T.F. Classen Memorial S. THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 77. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD, ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS (WHICH REFLECTS $26,250 FROM THE OHIO THOROUGHBRED FUND). Foaled in the State of Ohio as per requirements set forth by the Ohio State Racing Commission. Nomination fee is $50; $262 t o enter with an additional $488 to start, with a purse of $75,000, of which 60% to winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weights: Three-year-olds 119 lbs; Older 123. Non-Winners of $30,000 Twice in 2022-2023 allowed2 lbs; A Race other than Maiden, Claiming, Optional or Starter since October 27th, 2022 allowed 4 lbs; A Race other than Maiden, Claiming, Optional or Starter since April 27th, 2022 allowed 6 lbs. Nominations Closed Monday April 18th, 2022 with 15 Nominatt ions. Starters to be named through the entry box on Monday, April 25th, 2022. A Trophy to the winning Owner. This stake will not split. In the event more than fourteen (14) horses pass the entry box at the time of closing of entries, preference will be gi
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KICHI KITSU bumped at the start, sprinted clear soon thereafter, set all the pace, dug in gamely when challenged by the runner up to her outside and proved best under left handed urging. NEAR PERFECT bumped with the winner at the start. chased that one three wide into the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead past the furlong marker and was denied. PERFECTINGTHEVIEW unhurried early, had a mild late rally. NICEASAKITTENSEYES went evenly. MOBIL LADY chased the winner from the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. DANCIN' ROSIE well placed, failed to respond. DIVA POWER checked between horses entering the turn then lacked the needed response. BOSSY LADY was no factor. STAR RULES was no threat. KERRI'S MIRACLE was outrun. CHLOES ANGEL trailed. EDGE OF NIGHT settled mid pack, began to rally three wide on the turn, suffered and injury at the quarter pole, pulled up and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Edge of Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, injured past 1/4pole, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked between horses near 3/8pole, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Near Perfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, 3 wide, drew even late, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Kichi Kitsu
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, sprinted clear, dug in gamely, proved best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Louis V. Ruberto Jr.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICON never far back, closed with a rush three wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew off. K P SILVER BULLET never far back, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished clear for second. THE WILD FLYER unhurried early, found his best stied late in the seven path. VALHALLA AIR BASE close up from the start, finished with goo courage four wide. JOE BRRRR slow early, swung wide and closed a gap late. SMUDGE THE CAT stalked pace the pace along the inside and faded late. EL CARDINAL away alertly, set a pressured pace three then two wide into the stretch and weakened late. TWICE AS SMART prompted the pace three then two wide into the stretch and also weakened late. UPTOWN GUY was no factor. PERFECT PICTURE saved ground and lacked the needed response. JOYFUL CANDY showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Icon
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed with a rush 3 wide, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Joe Brrrr
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung wide, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: El Cardinal
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: K P Silver Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, mild rally 5path, clear second
